attributes.action: Reopen Hair and beauty salons during lockdown
attributes.additional_details: I want them to keep us open and as stated on a few reliable sources we were one of the safe industries to have open during these times. We took so many precautions and did over worked hours just to be shut down again.
attributes.background: As an industry that has taken a massive hit during the COVID-19 pandemic I’m looking for the government to re evaluate his decisions on constantly closing all hair and beauty salons.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555408
